room_title: Escape room "Soviet Spy Game" by Escape! Spokane in Spokane
review: Took a group of teenagers for a 16th birthday celebration. They had a great time and want to do it again!

room_title: Escape room "Soviet Spy Game" by Escape! Spokane in Spokane
review: We've done quite a few escape rooms all over the county, and the Soviet Spy Escape room at Escape was one of the toughest and most interesting. We worked really hard the whole time and escaped with only seconds remaining. Clues are only given when you specifically ask for them which is a great way to run an escape room.

room_title: Escape room "Soviet Spy Game" by Escape! Spokane in Spokane
review: We had a group of six people that got together for a friendâ€™s birthday, and we visited the Francis location for the Soviet themed room. The online instructions and over-the-phone customer service for making the reservation were fantastic, as was our face-to-face interactions with all the staff. The directions for the room itself were clear, and the staff were friendly and engaging. The location seemed clean and well-maintained, and we had a phenomenal experience. We will definitely be back!!
